name: Elephant ride - Central Highlands
description:
Drawn in Dong Ho style - Dong Ho folk woodcut painting is a line of Vietnamese folk painting originating in Dong Ho village. Embrace the tradition!

Elephant rides in Central Highlands have always been an attractive experience for the tourists. However, animal rights activists have long complained that the elephant rides were an exploitation of the animals, so Vietnam has banned the riding tour. This was confirmed by Central Highlands province’s Department of Culture, Sports and Tourism deputy director, Nguyen Thuy Phuong Hieu, who said they would look at other elephant-related services such as bathing and feeding the animals to offer tourists new experiences.
